title: Betrayed American workers expose dark underbelly of H-1B visa scheme
description: Critic lashes out: 'What are they gonna do? They're already not hiring me'
content:
They were promised lucrative and stable careers if they learned to code and earned a degree in software engineering.
Instead, many Americans in the tech industry have been left disillusioned as they… [+10915 chars]
